(Simplified: 蝼)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 婁 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 虫 [ chóng ] insect, worm; mollusk
    • 婁 [ lóu ] a constellation; to wear; surname
①(螻蛄)昆蟲，褐色，有翅，前腳強化爲挖掘足，能掘地，咬農作物的根。亦稱“天螻”、“蛞螻”、“土狗”；簡稱“螻”，如“螻蟻”(用以代表微小的生物，喻力量薄弱或地位低微的人)。
螻蟻 [ lóu yǐ ]: lit. mole cricket and ants; fig. tiny individuals with no power
螻蛄 [ lóu gū ]: mole cricket; Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
螻蛄科 [ lóu gū kē ]: Gryllolaptaptidae family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera; mole crickets
(Simplified: 蝼)

螻字的基本解释

螻
lóu
见“蝼”。

螻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lóu］
［《廣韻》落侯切，平侯，來。］
“漏2”的被通假字。“蝼1”的繁体字。亦作“蝼1”。
(1)蝼蛄。
(2)谓被蚁蛀蚀。
(3)谓肉有臭味如蝼蛄。
(4)古囿名。春秋时晋君畜养禽兽之所。

螻字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螻； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第15
【唐韻】落侯切【集韻】郞侯切【正韻】盧侯切，?音樓。螻蛄。詳蛄字註。　又螻蟈，蛙也。詳蟈字註。　又土螻，獸名。【山海經】崑崙之丘有獸焉，其狀如羊而四角，名曰土螻，是食人。【竹書紀年註】有大螻如羊。【魏公卿上尊號奏】有熊之興，地出大螻。　又【說文】螭亦名地螻。　又囿名。【晉語】趙?子田于螻。【註】螻，晉君之囿。　又【集韻】龍珠切，音廔。天螻，蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】螜，天螻。【古今注】螻蛄，一名天螻。【揚子·方言】蠀螬，秦、晉之閒謂之蠹，或謂之天螻。　又音漏。內病也。【周禮·天官·內饔】馬黑脊而般臂螻。【羣經音辨】螻，干寶讀去聲。【呂氏春秋】戸樞不腐，流水不螻。　【禮記】作漏。

Kera
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lóu］
["Guangyun" Luohou cut, Pinghou, come. ]
"Leak 2" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "蝼1". Also known as "蝼1".
(1) Mole cricket.
(2) Said to be eaten by ants.
(3) Said that the meat smells like mole crickets.
(4) Ancient name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Jinjun was the place where animals were raised.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝼; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 No. 15
[Tang Yun] Luo Hou Qi [Ji Yun] Yin Hou Qi [Zheng Yun] Lu Hou Qi,? Yinlou. Mole cricket. Detailed note of cricket.　Crafts and frogs again. Detailed note of the word grasshopper.　Again, the name of the beast. [Shanhaijing] Kunlun Hill has beast yan, which is like a sheep with four horns. It is called soil worm, which is cannibalism. 【Bamboo Chronicle Notes】There are big worms like sheep. [Wei Gongqing's horns play] There is a bear's happiness, and the earth comes out of the big worm.　[Said Wen] Jia is also known as Di Jia.　Another name. [Jin language] Zhao? Zi Tian Yu Jia. 【Note】Ke, the confinement of Jinjun.　[Jiyun] Dragon Ball cut, sound 廔. Sky worm, insect name. 【Erya·Release insects】Tianjiao, Tianjiao. [Ancient and modern note] Mole cricket, a sky cricket. 【Yangtze Dialect】The scorpionfish is called the scorpion scorpion in the Qin and Jin dynasties, or it is called the scorpion scorpion.　The sound leaks again. Internal disease also. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Nei饔】The horse has a black ridge and has a worm like arm. [Sound discrimination of the group scriptures] Kera, Qianbao read the sound. 【Lu Shi Chunqiu】The pivot is not rotted, and the running water is not thorny.　【Book of Rites】Omission.
